nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Discount is a six-page webcomic leading directly into the The Clone Wars episode "Duel of the Droids."

Passel Argente, Magistrate of the Corporate Alliance and Separatist Council member, rendezvouses with the Trandoshan scavenger Gha Nachkt aboard Nachkt's ship, the Vulture's Claw, to purchase a droid from him. Argente knew the Separatist Council, particularly Wat Tambor, would be watching him closely. He wanted to buy a droid he could use to spy on Tambor. Nachkt shows Argente what he had to offer. Argente at first expresses interest in the deactivated R2-D2, but Nachkt says he is reserved for another customer. Nachkt then shows Argente a RA-7 protocol droid and offers it to him at a discount. The deal was made. What Argente wasn't aware of was that the RA-7 droid was already programmed by Wat Tambor to spy on Argente himself. The double-agent droid was given to Nachkt to "sell" to Argente. After informing Tambor that the deal had been made, Nachkt receives his payment.
